songs.title: Woke Up This Morning
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus 1]
I woke up this morning
And the sun was shining
And the birds were singing
And everything was just fine

[Verse 1]
Almost like they were
Rubbing it in
So I woke up this morning
And I, I went back to bed
I woke up this morning
And I tried to lie
But the truth was there
In my bloodshot eyes
Well honey, your still gone
And you ain't came back yet
So I woke up this morning
And I, I went back to bed

[Chorus 2]
I know this world is going to spin
Whether I get up or I sleep in
Yeah, you being gone
Today's too much to swallow
So I'll try again tomorrow

[Verse 2]
I woke up this morning
Smelled spring on the breeze
Its like that wind was teasing me
But there's a breeze in my heart
And still a stone in my head
So I woke up this morning
And I, I went back to bed

[Chorus 2]

[Chorus 1]

[Outro]
Ohhhhhh
